author: slive
msg: Add mod_disk_cache and mod_mem_cache to the indexes.

author: bnicholes
msg: Don't hold the Apache screen open when it exits with an error if all of the error
messages are going to a file anyway.  In other words, don't hold the screen
open if the -E <filename> command line parameter is used.

msg: Add a little bit of content about the "-k" method
of signaling apache and change the apachectl examples
